sentence: Adam Kinzinger will be retiring from Congress later this year, and Liz Cheney faces a difficult primary challenge in her home state of Wyoming against Harriet Hageman, who has been endorsed by top GOP leaders like House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA).
author: Paul Bois
title: Anti-Trumpers Liz Cheney, Adam Kinzinger to Attend CPAC Counterprogramming' Summit

sentence: The main attractions on Saturday were Rep. Liz Cheney, the Wyoming Republican and fierce Trump critic recently removed from GOP House leadership, and Brad Raffensperger, the Republican secretary of state of Georgia who rebuffed Trump's claims of widespread voter fraud.
title: A MAGA gala, a far-right rally, and a plea for Jan. 6 justice: Trio of summits tests GOP's future

sentence: While Liz Cheney was cavorting with Never Trump sissies and squeezing donors, her opponent Harriet Hageman was at CPAC and word is that the Beltway Cowgirl is doomed.
author: Kurt Schlichter
title: The Big News Out of CPAC 2022 Is That Trump Is Back
